forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High around 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun. High 59F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. High around 60F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial clearing expected late. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 61F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 17C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 63F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low around 10C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 49F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with showers at times. High 17C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. High 63F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 11C. SSE winds shifting to W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 51F. SSE winds shifting to W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning with bright sunshine in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning with bright sunshine in the afternoon. High around 60F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 48F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to cloudy skies and rain in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning then becoming cloudy with periods of rain later in the day. High 59F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low near 10C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low around 50F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 14C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low around 10C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low around 50F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 14C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 57F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening with some clearing overnight. Low 11C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low 51F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 14C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 58F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 11C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 52F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
